jobDescription: Senior Data Analyst Responsibilities: Compiles and analyzes AUM, Revenue and other financial information from various systems  Develops automated models to improve financial analyses, reports and presentations  Creates or improves business and reporting processes  Ensures financial information has been recorded accurately in reports/systems  Performs or improve forecasting and reconciliation of financial data  Relies on experience and judgement to plan and accomplish goals  Performs a variety of complicated tasks  A wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected Requirements: Five years of Financial Analysis experience  Experience compiling and analyzing financial data  Strong knowledge and experience with databases (Access, Oracle, etc)  Strong Excel skills (VBA)  Strong Business Analysis skills  Strong Excel skills (VBA)  Finance/Accounting Bachelor degree with technical capability  Analytical and critical thinker  Comfortable navigating different systems for analysis or data gathering  We thank all candidates in advance. Only selected candidates for interviews will be contacted. For other exciting opportunities, please visit us at www.vtrac.com. VTRAC is an equal opportunity employer.
